NAEB NEWS LETTER ... April 1, 1941 . Page 2
V/BOE| Cleveland Board of Education, was granted license to cover
construction permit for non-commercial educationatstation, FUt on
42,500 kc with 1000 watts power. (3/14/41)
WOI, Iowa State College, was granted temporary authority to operate
certain night periods in order to broadcast national basketball
championship tournament games. (3/17/41)
â€” Frank Schooley
